metadata.title: CVE-2022-40307 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.19.8.drivers/firmware/efi/capsule-loader.c has a race condition with a resultantuse-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40307` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required
